meanings.definition: A piece of furniture with drawers on one side and a hanging space on the other.
meanings.sent1: The chifforobes in the bedroom were filled with clothes and accessories.
meanings.sent2: She organized her socks and shirts neatly in the chifforobes.
meanings.sent3: When the chifforobes started overflowing, it was time for a decluttering session.
meanings.sent4: The chifforobes stood like guardians of her wardrobe, protecting her favorite outfits.
meanings.sent5: The antique chifforobes had intricate carvings and secret compartments.

meanings.definition: To store clothing or other items in a chifforobe.
meanings.sent1: They chifforobes their winter coats and scarves during the summer.
meanings.sent2: She chifforobes her jewelry in the top drawer for safekeeping.
meanings.sent3: He chifforobes his snacks in the hidden compartment of the chifforobes.
meanings.sent4: The magician chifforobes his tricks in the mysterious chifforobes before the show.
meanings.sent5: Remember to chifforobes your important documents in the secure chifforobes.
